Ventral intermediate entorhinal area of.Definition: Cytoarchitecture field of entorhinal cortex of RHA11.  Caudally, the ventral-intermediate entorhinal area starts at the same level, or very closely to the medial entorhinal area, which borders VIE medially. The anterior border of VIE is with the amygdalo-entorhinal transitional field laterally, and with the peryamygdaloid cortex, medially.
